Lionize {2}{B} [i]({2}{B}, Exile this card from your hand: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and it gains the following abilities until end of turn. You may cast this card on a later turn from exile.)[/i]
Flying
Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and tap it. Any player may activate this ability.
